attributes.action: ABOLISH THE CORONAVIRUS ACT & MAKE MEASURES OPTIONAL WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT
attributes.additional_details:
NASA predicts there is a 0.42% chance of a meteor hitting earth the day before the USA election. 

Our human rights were revoked due to the threat of our hospitals becoming overwhelmed and death toll amounting to extraordinary amounts. The situation turned out to be manageable.  

Deaths (UK) according to our population (ONS 2018)
attributes.background:
Death rate % of the UK  population:

COVID 19 - 0.06% (WITH not from)
Misprescribed medication: 0.03%
Cancer: 0.25% 
Heart Disease: 0.26%

These are risks that we live with everyday without the Government dictating how we should behave, what we should wear and who we should socialise with.
